mapper.sql: coin_per_user.id, coin_by_exchange.id, exchange.id as id_exchange, exchange.name as nameExchange, coin.id as id_coin, coin.name, coin.short_name, quantity, invested, satoshi_buy, buy_date
mapper.insert: insert into coin_per_user (id, id_user, id_coin_by_exchange, quantity, invested) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idQuotation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{invested,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{satoshiBuy,jdbcType=NUMERIC})

mapper.update:
update coin_per_user
id_user = #{idUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
id_coin_by_exchange = #{idQuotation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
invested = #{invested,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
satoshi_buy = #{satoshiBuy,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update coin_per_user set id_user = #{idUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id_coin_by_exchange = #{idQuotation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, invested = #{invested,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, satoshi_buy = #{satoshiBuy,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select 'false' as QUERYID,
from coin_per_user INNER JOIN coin_by_exchange ON coin_per_user.id_coin_by_exchange = coin_by_exchange.id INNER JOIN user_info ON coin_per_user.id_user = user_info.id where coin_per_user.id = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select 'false' as QUERYID,
from coin_per_user INNER JOIN coin_by_exchange ON coin_per_user.id_coin_by_exchange = coin_by_exchange.id INNER JOIN exchange ON coin_by_exchange.id_exchange = exchange.id INNER JOIN coin ON coin_by_exchange.id_coin = coin.id INNER JOIN user_info ON coin_per_user.id_user = user_info.id where user_info.login = #{userLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
